delete_selected_game_dialog_text:
{} games from your file system.

If you want to clean other game related data for these games check options as needed.

Remember that deleting compatdata will destroy all your game progress if the game doesn't support cloud save.
delete_game_dialog_text:
'{}' Game from your file system.

If you want to clean other game related data check options as needed.

Remember that deleting compatdata will destroy all your game progress if the game doesn't support cloud save.
warning_action_undone: Warning: This action can't be undone
Warning: This action can't be undone
folder_no_contains_exe: This folder does not contain Exe files. Was this intended?
selected_data_games_was_deleted: Selected games and data were deleted
selected_data_was_deleted: Game '{}' and Selected data was deleted
path_duplicated: Path was not added because it was previously added
compat_data_deletion:
CompatData folder for game '{}' from your file system.

This will destroy all your game progress if this game doesn't support cloud save.
shadercache_data_deletion:
Shader cache for game '{}' from your file system.

Next time you run this game you will have to compile the shaders again so you could suffer from some temporal performance issues .

delete_all_selected_text:
all selected data from your file system. Things to take into account:

 1) About compat data: This will destroy all your game progress if this game doesn't support cloud save.
 2) About Shader cache data: Next time you run this game you will have to compile the shaders again so you could suffer from some temporal performance issues .
shader_page_no_selected_items: No data selected. Select what you want to delete first.
error_deleting_game_data:
There was an error deleting data.Some or All data items couldn't be deleted.

You Freed {}
success_deleting_game_data:
All data was deleted!.

cant_save_with_errors: Some games have errors. Fix them and try to Save again
cant_rename_with_errors: Some games have errors. Fix them and try to Rename again
steam_is_running_cant_action: We have detected that Steam is running. Game miner needs Steam to be closed to proceed with this action. Â¿Do you want to close Steam now?
export_selected_games_dialog_text:
Your are going to export all selected games.

If you have a previous configuration (Images included) they will be overwritten by the new configuration files.

Do you want to do it now?
data_not_saved_refresh: There is data that you haven't saved. If you refresh you will loose it. Do you want to refresh now?
data_not_saved_exit: There is data that you haven't saved. If you exit Game Miner you will loose it. Do you want to exit now?
reset_changing_user: After changing users Game miner needs to be restarted. Press Ok, and relaunch Game Miner
config_not_saved_exit_text: The are configuration changes that have not been saved. If you exit you will loose them. Do you want to exit now?
data_not_saved_exit_text: The is game data that has not been saved. Do you want to exit?
config_not_saved_change_user_text: The are configuration changes that have not been saved. If you change users you will loose them. Do you want to change users now?
data_not_saved_change_user_text: There is game data that has not been saved. If you change users you will loose them. Do you want to change users now?
name: Name
import_config_dialog_text:
You are going to reset this game to the exported configuration. If you have pending changes they will be lost and if you downloaded new images for this game like banners, icons, etc. they will be overwritten by the ones active when you exported the configuration.

Do you want to continue?
import_games_config_dialog_text:
You are going to reset selected games to their exported configuration. If you have pending changes they will be lost and if you downloaded new images for these game like banners, icons, etc. they will be overwritten by the ones active when you exported the configuration.

Do you want to continue?
game_was_imported: Game was reset, just save to keep the changes
game_config_deleted_error: There was an error deleting config {}
games_config_deleted_error: Some game configurations couldn't be deleted
delete_games_config_dialog_text:
You are going to delete the configuration for the selected games. This will erase the configurations themself and all the images that were active when the configurations was saved.

Do you want to continue?
delete_game_config_dialog_text:
You are going to delete {} game configuration . This will erase the configuration itself and all the images that were active when the configuration was saved.

Do you want to continue?
